A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. Horrible writing. Plot holes everywhere. Meaningless side plots. Weak conflict. Overly cutesy BS creatures. Absolute disregard for beloved characters. Wastes excellent new characters for no reason. The acting from Adam Driver and Mark Hamill was great\, but that doesn't change the fact that their characters were disrespected by the writers. The half star is for them and only them.
